name: Guardian Of the Ether
description:
You can smell the gas now, but you know it's too late. As your draw your last breath, you think about all the things you wanted to do, the place you wanted to visit, I guess it is too late now or is it!!!!

You wake up in a new body with a voice in your head, it seems you have been given a second chance, but a second chance to do what exactly, what is a hunter, and more importantly where are you.

Begin your hunter journey...
